comment: LOVE Dr. Fraizer!  This is such a great class and I highly recommend everyone taking it.  Follow the syllabus, attend class, and follow instructions.  Take notes! Very social class.  I made lots of friends by taking this class.  We all made sure to have several classes together this semester.

EASY CLASS. just make sure you complete your assignments and that they comply with what she wants. read the novels. come to class-THIS is the class where you will make the most friends (especially in a Learning Community). can be boring- but is helpful. she is nice-doesnt like people who ask alot of questions tho. i made an A :)

She is crystal clear on assignments.class content is very boring and mostly common sense. this is a very easy A. However, I had more busy work in this class than ALL my other classes combined. This is not college level material. this should not be a required course. Again, it is basic knowledge. I did LOVE Dr. Frazier! she rocks! Great Professor!
Take this class. Easiest A all year. end of story

I took Dr Frazier in the Fall of 2008 & loved her! She is very knowledgeable and helpful. I was actually able to apply skills she taught me to be a successful college student. KSU 1101 may be considered a ridiculous class but since its required take Frazier!
She is ALOT of fun in class, makes a worthless class very interesting
Great Class. Great Professor. Always clear on assignments, never was confused at all in class. Attend class, keep your syllabus, and pay attention and you should do great in class.

Dr. Frazier was very clear on the assignments. She gave us a syllabus and followed it to the T. She gave me great confidence in coming back to school and was always available. GREAT personality!! I loved coming to class.

She is very nice and personable! If you like friendly teachers she is great! If you turn in assignments you get full credit! I took her during the summer, so we did less work, and wasn't very time consuming. Her tests were specific so they do require some studying! But overall she was a GREAT first professor to have for me!

Dr. Fraizer's class is pretty easy if you do your assignments. She gives a lot of pointless assignments and tries very hard to be "cool". I felt like I didn't learn anything about this class and her tests were oddly specific. She tells people she is teaching them to grow up and be independent, and then she baby's you though the class. Very Annoying
Very nice and energetic!  I hated having to take this class, but she was a great teacher!  She loves teaching and it shows!
best psych teacher! test and pop quizzes are straight from the book. questions arent tricky and she makes lectures interesting and fun. i would definitely take her again
she's nice and really wants to help out her students in doing well in the long run. As long as you read the books assigned to you and you do not miss more than 3 classes, you should do well.
